coreAtributes.name: Priapus' Cock Ring of Power
coreAtributes.description: The origin of this ancient ring is unknown, but when touched by an open flame, the name of the craftsman, Priapus, glows briefly on ring’s surface. When placed around your cock, the ring’s dark magic causes your masculine anatomy to increase in size.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull off the cock ring. You're filled with an inexplicable feeling of loss. This ring feels "precious" to you.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls off your cock ring. You're filled with an inexplicable feeling of loss. This ring feels "precious" to you.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pulls off your cock ring. You're filled with an inexplicable feeling of loss. This ring feels "precious" to you.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide the ring onto your cock. The metal is warm to the touch and your skin feels an inexplicable tingle.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide the ring onto [npc.name]'s cock.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slide the ring onto [npc.name]'s cock.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the ring onto your cock. The metal is warm to the touch and your skin feels an inexplicable tingle.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] slides the ring onto your cock. The metal is warm to the touch and your skin feels an inexplicable tingle.
